originalText.text: We hired Blue in Green at the suggestion of our landscape architect who recommended them to do the initial planting after a major renovation on our townhouse garden space four years ago. We were so pleased with them that we hired them to do our garden maintenance as well. Their work is beautiful, they are reliable and courteous, and they are excellent at communicating - providing helpful images, clear estimated costs and accurate scheduling. As an interior designer, I have high standards for other design professionals and I highly recommend Blue in Green!

As an interior designer, I have high standards for other design professionals and I highly recommend Blue in Green!

originalText.text: Naima and her team are wonderful and would highly recommend them for landscape design and maintenance.  They listened to what we were looking for and designed a natural and beautiful urban rooftop space that is now home to many birds, bees, butterflies, and even the occasional humming bird.  They are also reliable and communicative when it comes to maintaining the space.

They are also reliable and communicative when it comes to maintaining the space.

originalText.text: We’ve worked on many garden and terrace renovations, both big and small, with the Blue in Green team.  Their team is incredibly organized and takes strong control of the entire project coordinating across all of the trades to deliver gorgeous results.

text.text: We’ve worked on many garden and terrace renovations, both big and small, with the Blue in Green team.  Their team is incredibly organized and takes strong control of the entire project coordinating across all of the trades to deliver gorgeous results.

originalText.text: Naima and her team were great to work with. Very communicative and have a unique eye for creating biodiverse plantings!

text.text: Naima and her team were great to work with. Very communicative and have a unique eye for creating biodiverse plantings!

originalText.text:
My husband and I have owned the Couleur Café for 15 years.

Every year Blue in Green Gardens creates the most magnificent window box displays infront of our store. Our customer's moods are instantly lifted before even entering our café. They rave of how appreciative they are, of the gorgeous and thoughtfully crafted displays.

B.I.G.G. is extremely trustworthy, hardworking, energetic, and versatile. Every seasonal installation is unique, usually lavish, and always an uplifting, eye pleasing focal point for all of Park Slope.

I love the meticulous and personal touch that Ruomi, Naima and their team consistently deliver.

Thank you for always brightening our little corner of Brooklyn !
